About mrgsim.ds - 


## Installation

You can install the development version of mrgsim.ds from 
[GitHub](https://github.com/kylebaron/mrgsim.ds) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("kylebaron/mrgsim.ds")
```
